subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Sabres scored three goals in a span of less than six minutes in the third period to erase a three-goal deficit and send the game to extra time, where they would win in a shootout.
snippet: The Sabres scored three goals in a span of less than six minutes in the third period to erase a three-goal deficit and send the game to extra time, where they would win in a shootout.
